Portal 2 is the best puzzle game I have ever played and one of the best games in general.  It has a rich story, lore and great gameplay.  The puzzles are challenging on a first play though, but the game is paced and balanced that it never feels frustrating or impossible.  After playing nearly 50 hours of this game,  I can honestly rate it 10/10.  The story and gameplay never get boring or repetitive.  And for the low price, I can highly recommend it.  But maybe consider playing portal 1 first, as this game kinda spoils the ending of the first one, but it is not necessary in the slightest.

Classic Valve Game
Has a story mode that took me about 12 hours to beat on my first playthrough, but I'm bad at puzzles.
The voice acting is very entertaining, and if you've ever heard a joke about lemons, it's from this game.
There's also a 2 player co-op mode which is really fun if you can grab a buddy.

After 10 years, this game still holds the leaderboard for best games in my opinion, I still remember playing this on my dad's account (THEWHISPERSINTHEDARK). It was the only game I would pretty much play and will continue playing. Hell, I'm surprised that there are people who hate the game who hate the game in the first place.
one of my favorite games of all time. valve please fix

One of my most favourite games of all time. The story is unique and the characters and everything spreads with personality and charm. This game not only lives up to its predecessor; it goes far beyond it in every way.

Going into Portal 2, I did not expect much after I played the first game, but wow was I wrong. The game does not look outdated at all, still functions and runs well (Feels like a modern day game), and has some amazing characters, environments, and puzzles. Overall this game is a timeless masterpiece that everyone should play. On top of the game itself, the multiplayer is also fun, challenging, and rewarding as well.
Great Fun Game! The Story Is Great, Also The Co-op Gamemode Is AMAZING So For 10$ I Really Do Recommend This Game! (:
porgal 2...
Perfect!!!
Get it, you won't regret it

I bought Portal 2 on my computer after having the game on PS3 for a long time, which was well worth it. 

Portal 2 is hands-down one of the best games I've ever played. It takes everything about Portal that was great and made it even better. This game has amazing writing with witty, memorable dialogue and characters that are completely full of life.  

The gameplay in Portal 2 is nothing short of masterfully clever puzzles and mechanics, my favorites of which are the concept of retaining momentum through portals and the addition of the propulsion, repulsion, and conversion gels. It's clear that the developers wanted you to really think with portals, as the puzzles were rightfully challenging in the first playthrough, and can still be quite challenging if you come back to the game later on. 

Another thing that makes this game so great is the fact that it's very replay-friendly. I could play this game over and over, while still enjoying the dialogue and puzzles, as well as the ability to find new hidden secrets. Not only is it replayable, but the community is also wonderful in creating new mods and stories for the game to add extra gameplay and new types of puzzles using Portal as a baseline. 

I completely recommend this to anyone who hasn't tried it, or anyone who has been curious in what Portal is about. Though, I would also recommend playing Portal first as it has important story that influences a lot of the events in Portal 2.

O jogo segue a essência do primeiro, com salas recheadas de puzzles desafiantes e trazendo novas mecânicas inéditas, a história é muito bem elaborada com ótimos plots e personagens memoráveis (aliás aconselho a jogarem o primeiro jogo antes para entender melhor o enredo). Os gráficos são excelentes, contado com cenários lindos e emersivos, fazendo você dar uma pequena pausa apenas para contemplá-los.
